description: Long and well-insulated down jacket for really cold winter climates. A beloved Fjällräven classic from 1974, here with an updated fit for men. Warm hood and generous pockets with extra openings that let you put your hands in from the sides. Padded with high-quality ethically produced down. Offset down channel construction eliminates heat loss. Shoulders are reinforced with synthetic padding to resist moisture and pressure.
name: Expedition Down Jacket - Mens
